alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 9:21PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Harding, northwestern Butte and northeastern Crook Counties through 1000 PM MDT... At 920 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Gustave to 7 miles east of Alzada. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colony, Antelope Butte and Two Top Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for northwestern South Dakota...and northeastern Wyoming.
